answers.answer: Yes, he should go to see his Dr. It could be poor circulation, it does'nt sound like gout. Of course I'm not a Dr so I can't say for sure.Does your father have diabetes?   Remar

question: My father has recently noticed that his big toe is turning alittle purple and the one next to it is a little purple. Could it be poor circulation or gout? Should he go see a doctor?
title: 2 purple toe nails
